Headline: #29 State Temporary Reroute at State/ Cermak
ShortDescription: 29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via State, 23rd, Wabash, Cermak, and State: due to, street blockage near State/Cermak.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#29 State  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via State, 23rd, Wabash, Cermack, and State: due to, street blockage near State/ Cermak.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express, #146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near Lake Shore Dr/LaSalle
ShortDescription: NB 147 Otr DuSable Lk Shr Exp,146 Inr Lk Shr/Michigan Exp buses are temp. rerouted via Michigan, Oak, Inner LSD, LaSalle, Stockton, Sheridan, Belmont & LSD

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express, #146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Express buses are temporarily rerouted via  Michigan, Oak, Inner LSD, LaSalle, Stockton, Sheridan, Belmont and Lake Shore Drive due to street blockage near Lake Shore Dr/LaSalle.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #66 Chicago Temporary Reroute near Chicago/Bishop.
ShortDescription: 66 Chicago buses temp. rerouted WB Chicago, Noble, Augusta, Ashland and Chicago EB Chicago, Ashland, Grand, Ogden and Chicago near Chicago/ Bishop.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Chicago/ Bishop due to street blockage near Chicago/ Bishop.

Westbound buses will operate via Chicago, Noble, Augusta, Ashland and Chicago.

Eastbound buses will operate via Chicago, Ashland, Grand, Ogden and Chicago.

Allow extra travel time.
